sentences.en: Calcium may aid in the prevention of colon cancer.
sentences.cn: 钙可能有助于预防结肠癌。

sentences.en: Crime prevention had to be given more prominence.
sentences.cn: 防止犯罪方面应当受到更多的重视。

sentences.en: Crime Prevention Officers can visit your home and suggest ways to make it safer.
sentences.cn: 预防犯罪的官员可以登门拜访并就如何使居所更安全向你提出建议。

sentences.en: For help on crime prevention, call our 24-hour advice line.
sentences.cn: 若想获得预防犯罪方面的帮助，请拨打我们的24小时咨询热线。

sentences.en: I will discuss the role of diet in cancer prevention in Chapter 7.
sentences.cn: 我会在第7章详细论述日常饮食在抗癌中的作用。

sentences.en: It's called the Pan-Carib-bean Disaster Preparedness and Prevention Project, which is quite a mouthful.
sentences.cn: 它被称为thePan-CaribbeanDisasterPreparednessandPreventionProject（泛加勒比备灾防灾项目），名称相当冗长拗口。

sentences.en: Prevention and cure are both attended to.
sentences.cn: 预防和治疗都有了着落.

sentences.en: Prevention is better than cure, so start looking after your heart now.
sentences.cn: 防病比治病好, 所以从现在开始照顾好你的心脏.

sentences.en: Prevention of forest fires is up to you.
sentences.cn: 森林防火是你们的责任.

sentences.en: Stress should be put on the prevention of diseases.
The main emphasis of our research has shifted to the prevention of infection and septicemia.
sentences.cn: 我们研究的重点转到预防感染和败血病方面来.

sentences.en: The nutrition plays a role in the prevention of nearsightedness.
sentences.cn: 这种营养剂对预防近视有一定作用.

sentences.en: They put a high premium on prevention and primary care.
sentences.cn: 他们对预防和初级护理极为重视。

sentences.en: This year's budget for AIDS prevention probably won't be much higher.
sentences.cn: 今年用于防治艾滋病的预算很可能不会比往年高很多。

sentences.en: You know what they say, prevention is better than cure (= it is better to stop something bad from happening than to remove the problem once it has happened ) .

words.tran_cn: 预期的；以前的；预防的；先行的
可预防的；可阻止的；可防止的

phrases.tran_cn: 防疫；疫病防治；流行病预防
损失预防；预防损失的措施

trans.tran_en: when something bad is stopped from happening
